snippet.title: METALCORE: Gameplay Trailer | Open World Mechanized Combat NFT Game
snippet.description:
https://discord.gg/metalcore
https://www.metalcore.gg

MetalCore is a free-to-play, first-person/third-person multiplayer mechanized combat game powered by towering War Machines fighting for dominance in large-scale battles. Set in a vast game universe the game features a huge, 3-way Faction War that pits the anarchist Metal Punks against the theocratic Holy Corporation (Holy Corp) and despotic Gearbreakers. Take on the role of various characters, pilot vehicles, fight against AI NPCs, compete in large-scale PVP battles for territory and resources and explore the vast open world.

MetalCore is the first massively multiplayer online (MMO) combat game that combines the engagement of traditional gaming with digital asset ownership like NFTs intricately designed into gameplay.

Developed by experienced game industry veterans and with NFT art designed by Hugo award winning artists, MetalCore will be the first truly decentralized blockchain game experience.

Welcome to the Metalverse.

Some cinematic shots were done in-engine but the majority of the footage is gameplay.
